Author: fishonthesun
Text: Seconding this. It may sound like that "starvation mode" thing but in reality, if you restrict you're likely losing muscle and fat. Muscle is really what makes the cals burn so the less muscle, the lower the BMR. Probably only by a couple hundred cals tho. The majority of what you gain is water weight/ retention/ food weight from eating much more than usual. Please keep trying to eat maintenance, it will even out eventually!

Author: isthised
Text: Your BMR could have slowed from restricting.
